FIRST.title: Recent FIRST
FIRST.intro: Something fresh in day to day.

sections.heading: Comedy show
items: Last minute decision that me and my friends went running for about an hour then went to the stand up comedy show at COMEDY PLUS. First time I was there, I liked some of the jokes but mostly I enjoyed seeing someone perform in a raw and amusing way. From their personal experiences, then to switch perceptions, to articulate or deliver the story in a connecting yet off kind of way. I like the creativity needed and the rawness of doing that.

sections.heading: Typhoon break
items: 2025 first typhoon break. Not expected to have a break. I was in cleaning mode full on. From vacuuming, mopping, changing sheets, recycling, throwing away old clothes, cleaning up piled up stuff on the desk and floor. That’s exactly what I needed - resetting the living environment. And then cleaning up my mind, taking a nap, and doing some journaling at an outdoor wooden desk while the winds were getting stronger. This also helped a lot.

sections.heading: Heptabase
items: You all should check this out. I’ve been dumping so many things on Heptabase. I once tried notion, but notion somehow needed the ability to build aesthetic structure which is out of my capacity. I like to have a space that is intuitive enough to dump things out. It’s been my everyday life. I have listed the heptabase test out for a few months, glad i did make a try starting in May. The startup founder is a young Taiwanese. Shot out to him!

PASTIME.title: PASTIME
PASTIME.intro: Activities and hobbies that bring consistent pleasure and engagement.

items: Guitar - not Ed Sheeran, but Oasis vibe. So one day I was thinking of picking up the classic ed sheeran’s song - A team, which is probably the first song I knew from him and was introduced by my classmates in junior high. The strumming of that song is new and tricky for me and I was trying to spare some time to learn it to an acceptable level. I don’t know, maybe 15 minutes went by and my little brother entered the room. “Why are you playing this one, you should play that song you sent me a few days ago” He was referring to a clip of XXX playing Don’t look back in anger by Oasis. I sent that clip to him for one, It's a beautiful cover. Secondly I was hoping he’ll pick up the chords and teach me how to play. He didn’t. And I was easily influenced. Sorry Ed sheeran. I then searched for how to play Don’t look back in anger by Oasis. Great one. Now the guitar is still tuned at 455Hz.
Book: 101 Essays That Will Change The Way You Think by Brianna West. not a bookworm, yet this type of book i do enjoy. Send recommendation.

joy.content: Clients make a second appointment. I’m happy. Live Oasis clip on youtube.

peace.content: lay on grass and read lesuirely. Stress comes from doing too little of what you care about. This quote has been a great reminder for myself and  lead me to guide myself into more peaceful state

happiness.content: playing guitar and singing. Running with friends and chatting with them are great. Tasty Squid that brother's friend generiosly share with us. Fried Squid with peper, simple and tasty.

wonder.content: oh the blue flower. Very cool
